snippet: Each week, the co-founders of the New York Fashion Film Festival are curating a film for T. The first is “Hors d’Oeuvre,” by Monica Menez.
abstract: Each week, the co-founders of the New York Fashion Film Festival are curating a film for T. The first is “Hors d’Oeuvre,” by Monica Menez.

byline.original: By CHRIS LABDZA and BON DUKE

headline.main: A Surreal Short Film From the New York Fashion Film Festival
